title: File is dirtied but not changed by code assist
description: When using code assist, the file is marked as dirtied even though no changes have been made to the file.
OB: The file is marked as dirtied, but no changes are made to the file. Additionally, the code assist does not appear.
EB: The file should remain unchanged and not be marked as dirtied when using code assist. The code assist should also appear as expected.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the file 
2. Trigger the code assist 
3. Observe that the file is marked as dirtied, but no changes are made to the file and the code assist does not appear.
